Two factor authentication (2FA) strength: Two factor authentication (2FA) strengthens access security by requiring two methods (also referred to as factors) to verify your identity. Tiempo desde que se registra el pedido e: Time from when the order is registered in the ERP until it is created in the production system

calendar.legend.working_day_desc: Standard working day. The plant operates with regular shifts and production/OEE is recorded.
calendar.legend.holiday_desc: Official holiday. No production is planned. Productivity indicators may be excluded.
calendar.legend.maintenance_desc: Planned downtime for preventive/corrective maintenance. Counted as non-working day.
calendar.legend.vacation_desc: Collective or area vacations. Production may be reduced or null according to planning.
calendar.legend.weekend_desc: Saturday/Sunday. By default non-working unless otherwise defined in the calendar.
calendar.legend.special_desc: Special configuration: exceptional days, events or temporary shift changes.
If a region is selected, only holidays a: If a region is selected, only holidays applicable to that region will be imported (national holidays always included).
Se establecerá la fecha/hora de fin a ah: The end date/time will be set to now and the user will be the current one.
If selected No, the UI will show a non-b: If selected No, the UI will show a non-blocking indicator instead of the full overlay.

Uses the finished_at field to confirm th: Uses the finished_at field to confirm that the order is ready to load. Yellow or red indicates pending completion or overdue.
Green means the process is finished. Amb: Green means the process is finished. Amber means it is still pending in production.
Show scheduled delivery dates or finishe: Show scheduled delivery dates or finished timestamps so logistics can plan loading priorities.
Displays item codes and descriptions inc: Displays item codes and descriptions included in the order for quick verification at the warehouse.
Use the filters above to focus on pendin: Use the filters above to focus on pending processes when coordinating with production.

Enable automatic calculation and storage: Enable automatic calculation and storage in optimal_sensor_times and product_lists
Allow Auto-Update of Sensor Optimal Time: Allow Auto-Update of Sensor Optimal Time
Allow the automatic calculation to updat: Allow the automatic calculation to update the optimal_production_time field in sensors table
You will not be able to recover this opt: You will not be able to recover this optimal time!
Configure automatic calculation settings: Configure automatic calculation settings for the sensor
Optimal time applied to sensor successfu: Optimal time applied to sensor successfully.
Current optimal production time configur: Current optimal production time configured in the sensor
Multiplier for stop time calculation (x2: Multiplier for stop time calculation (x2, x3, x4...)
Minimum threshold to start updating opti: Minimum threshold to start updating optimal time when it increases (e.g., 20%)
Maximum limit factor when updating incre: Maximum limit factor when updating increased time (e.g., 98% to cap at 98% of calculated value)
Updates optimal time only if new calcula: Updates optimal time only if new calculation is lower OR if higher and exceeds Min Correction % threshold, applying Max Correction % as limit.
Días totales transcurridos entre dos fec: Total days elapsed between two dates (includes all calendar days, both working and non-working). Example: 9d = 9 complete days.
Días en los que se trabaja según el cale: Days on which work is done according to the configured work calendar (Monday-Friday or custom customer calendar). These are productive days.
Días en los que NO se trabaja: fines de: Days on which work is NOT done: weekends, holidays, vacations or maintenance shutdowns. Sum: Total = Working + Non-Working.
Las siguientes gráficas muestran los tie: The following charts show times calculated using only working days, excluding weekends, holidays and maintenance shutdowns according to the configured calendar.
